Key Match Events: Hemaloto Polovili created the first goal and scored the second for Tonga
Taci Kumsuz scored for Cook Islands to half the arrears
Tremaine Rimene-Albrett let fly from the edge of the box for Cook Islands but was saved by Semisi Otukolo
Christopher Kefu grabbed a crucial third goal for Tonga
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tonga will now face the winner of Friday’s second match between American Samoa and Samoa on Monday
Tonga defied the odds to secure their place in Monday’s final match
Tonga played themselves into the ascendency with their physicality
The captain then had the opportunity to double the lead from the penalty spot
Others: Viliami Tikoipau showed excellent composure to slot the ball under goalkeeper Ngereine Maro
Hemaloto Polovili confidently smashed it into the left-hand corner to double his side’s lead
Viliami Tukia spotted goalkeeper Maro off his line and lifting an effort from distance that landed just over the crossbar
Semisi Otukolo made an awkward save that deflected just past the post
Christopher Kefu appeared to injure himself in the process of scoring the third goal
